```{r}
RM <- read.csv("Residential Mortgages.csv",header=TRUE)
head(RM)
names(RM)
```

```{r}
library(lattice)
par(mfrow = c(2,2))
df <- unique(RM[c(2:6,9:16,20,22,26:31)]) 
head(df)
```
```{r}
var_list<- names(df)[1:5,7:21]
models <- lapply(var_list, 
          function(x) 
            {
             mod = lm(substitute(DefaultedLoans ~ i, list(i = as.name(x))), data = df)
            })
```
